title: Mount Royal Bagel Bakery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Delivery, Take-out, Kosher, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Makes a wide variety of kosher bagels and several other menu items which are 100 % vegetarian. Has a vegan whole wheat, a vegan multi-grain bagel, and soy cream cheese. All the soups are vegan as well.
